trans-unit.source: Controls rights to access HTTP Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: Direitos de controlos para aceder a recursos de Internet de HTTP.

trans-unit.source: WebPermission provides a set of methods and properties to control access to Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: WebPermission fornece um conjunto de métodos e propriedades para controlar o acesso aos recursos da Internet.

trans-unit.source: You can use a WebPermission to provide either restricted or unrestricted access to your resource, based on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> that is set when the WebPermission is created.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar um WebPermission para fornecer acesso restrito ou sem restrições para o recurso, com base no <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>que é definida quando o WebPermission é criado.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Create a WebPermission instance by calling its constructor using one of the following sets of parameters: - No parameters.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma instância de WebPermission ao chamar o construtor utilizando um dos seguintes conjuntos de parâmetros:-sem parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>é <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: - A <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Specify either <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> to allow any URI to be used in the target class, or <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> to allow access only to URIs that you specify through the use of the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Especifique o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>para permitir que qualquer URI a ser utilizado na classe de destino, ou <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>para permitir o acesso apenas a URIs que especificou através da utilização do <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> value and a URI string.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>valor e uma cadeia URI.</xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: The specified URI has permissions granted by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> value.
trans-unit.target: O URI especificado tem permissões concedidas à <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>valor.</xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> specifier and URI regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>Especificador e a expressão regular de URI.</xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> hold the URIs to which you have granted access permission.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>e <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>Reter URIs aos quais concedeu permissão de acesso.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add a URI to either of these lists, use <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um URI para qualquer uma destas listas, utilize <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you pass <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> as the <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> parameter, the URI will be added to the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se passa <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>como o <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>parâmetro, o URI será adicionado ao <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> </xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: WebPermission will allow connections to your target class with URIs matching the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>.
trans-unit.target: WebPermission irá permitir ligações para a classe de destino com os URIs correspondente <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > To deny access to an Internet resource, you must deny access to all the possible paths to that resource.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Para negar o acesso a um recurso de Internet, tem de negar o acesso a todos os caminhos de possíveis para esse recurso.

trans-unit.source: This requires calling <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with state parameter set to <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isto requer que <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>com o parâmetro de estado definido como <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>.</xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A better approach is to allow access to the specific resource only.
trans-unit.target: Uma abordagem de melhor é permitir o acesso ao recurso específico apenas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this subject, refer to the [NIB: Using the Deny Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6b4d2e01-c504-4ac3-b50e-d6f5e7f5df25) topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre este assunto, consulte o [NIB: utilizando o método negar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6b4d2e01-c504-4ac3-b50e-d6f5e7f5df25) tópico.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You need to deny access using only the resource canonical path.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Precisa de negar o acesso utilizando apenas o caminho de canónico do recurso.

trans-unit.source: There is no need to use all the path's syntactical variations.
trans-unit.target: Não é necessário utilizar variações syntactical do caminho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > User name and default port information is stripped from the <xref:System.Uri> before the comparison with the regular expression argument that is supplied to the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%28System.Net.NetworkAccess%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Informações de porta de nome e a predefinição do utilizador são eliminadas do <xref:System.Uri>antes da comparação com o argumento de expressão regular fornecida para o <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%28System.Net.NetworkAccess%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex%29>construtor.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.%23ctor%28System.Net.NetworkAccess%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex%29> </xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: If the regular expression contains user information or the default port number, then all incoming <xref:System.Uri>s will fail to match the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: Se a expressão regular contém informações de utilizador ou o número de porta predefinido, em seguida, todos os entrada <xref:System.Uri>s irão falhar corresponder à expressão regular.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância de <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>classe.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty permission that does not grant any rights.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma permissão vazia que não concede quaisquer direitos.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class that passes all demands or fails all demands.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> classe passa em todos os imperativas ou todas as exigências de falha.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `state` parameter is either <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>, respectively yielding fully restricted or fully unrestricted access to all security variables.
trans-unit.target: O valor da `state` parâmetro está <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>, respetivamente gerar resultados totalmente restrito ou totalmente acesso sem restrições para todas as variáveis de segurança.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>, then you can give access to individual URIs using <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se especificar <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>, em seguida, pode conceder acesso de URIs individuais utilizando <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class with the specified access rights for the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> classe com os direitos de acesso especificado para o URI especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> and grants its target permission to either make a remote host connection or accept a remote host connection using the URI described by the `uriString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>e concede a permissão de destino para se tornar remoto alojar ligação ou aceitar uma ligação de anfitrião remoto utilizando o URI descrito através do `uriString` parâmetro.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: A NetworkAccess value that indicates what kind of access to grant to the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de NetworkAccess que indica o tipo de acesso para conceder para o URI especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> indicates that the application is allowed to accept connections from the Internet on a local resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref>indica que a aplicação está autorizada a aceitar ligações a partir da Internet num recurso local.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> indicates that the application is allowed to connect to specific Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref>indica que a aplicação tem permissão para ligar a recursos de Internet específicos.

trans-unit.source: A URI string to which access rights are granted.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia URI para que o acesso são concedidos direitos.

trans-unit.source: uriString is .
trans-unit.target: uriStringis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class with the specified access rights for the specified URI regular expression.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> classe com os direitos de acesso especificado para a expressão regular de URI especificada.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> and grants its target permission to either make a remote host connection or accept a remote host connection using the URI described by the `uriRegex`parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa um <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>e concede a permissão de destino para se tornar remoto alojar ligação ou aceitar uma ligação de anfitrião remoto utilizando o URI descrito através do `uriRegex`parâmetro.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is recommended that you create `uriRegex` using the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> flags.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > É recomendado que crie `uriRegex` utilizando o <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>sinalizadores.</xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> or <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) in two ways.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um candidato a cadeia URI é verificado com a lista de expressões regulares relevantes (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> ou <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) de duas formas.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a <xref:System.Uri> and checked against the appropriate list.
trans-unit.target: Em primeiro lugar, o cadeia URI do candidato é verificado face à lista de adequadas; em seguida, se não houver nenhuma correspondência, o candidate cadeia URI é convertido para um <xref:System.Uri>e verificado face à lista de adequado.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> value that indicates what kind of access to grant to the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"> </xref> valor que indica o tipo de acesso para conceder para o URI especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> indicates that the application is allowed to accept connections from the Internet on a local resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref>indica que a aplicação está autorizada a aceitar ligações a partir da Internet num recurso local.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> indicates that the application is allowed to connect to specific Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref>indica que a aplicação tem permissão para ligar a recursos de Internet específicos.

trans-unit.source: A regular expression that describes the URI to which access is to be granted.
trans-unit.target: Uma expressão regular que descreve o URI para o qual o acesso é para ser concedido.

trans-unit.source: This property returns an enumeration of a single accept permissions held by this <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve uma enumeração de um único aceitar permissões contidas por este <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The possible objects types contained in the returned enumeration are <xref:System.String> and <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos possíveis são tipos contidos na enumeração devolvida <xref:System.String>e <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This property gets a list of local resources permitted by this <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade obtém uma lista de recursos locais permitidos pela <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: The class to which you have applied <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> only has permission to receive an incoming connection to local resources found in this list.
trans-unit.target: A classe a que aplicou <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>só tem permissão para receber uma ligação recebida aos recursos locais encontrado nesta lista.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can add URIs to this list using <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Pode adicionar os URIs a esta lista utilizando <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions (AcceptList or <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) in two ways.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um candidato a cadeia URI é verificado com a lista de expressões regulares relevantes (AcceptList ou <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) de duas formas.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a <xref:System.Uri> and checked against the appropriate list.
trans-unit.target: Em primeiro lugar, o cadeia URI do candidato é verificado face à lista de adequadas; em seguida, se não houver nenhuma correspondência, o candidate cadeia URI é convertido para um <xref:System.Uri>e verificado face à lista de adequado.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface that contains accept permissions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>interface contém aceitar permissões.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified URI string with the specified access rights to the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a cadeia URI especificada com os direitos de acesso especificado para o atual <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you have specified <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> as the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, use AddPermission to permit the use of `uriString` in the target class.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver especificado <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>como o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, utilize AddPermission para permitir a utilização de `uriString` na classe de destino.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The way that `uriString` can be used by the target class is specified by `access`.
trans-unit.target: A forma que `uriString` pode ser utilizado de destino da classe especificada pela `access`.

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> as the access parameter to add the URI specified by the `uriString` parameter to the list of URI accept strings, or specify <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> as the access parameter to add the URI to the list of URI connect strings.
trans-unit.target: Especifique <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>como o parâmetro de acesso para adicionar o URI especificado pelo `uriString` parâmetro à lista de URI aceitar as cadeias ou especifique <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>como o acesso de parâmetro para adicionar o URI à lista de URI ligar cadeias.</xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> </xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Calling AddPermission on <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Net.WebPermission> will have no effect, because permission is granted to all URIs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chamar AddPermission no <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Net.WebPermission>não tem qualquer efeito, porque a permissão é concedida a todos os URIs.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> or <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) in two ways.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um candidato a cadeia URI é verificado com a lista de expressões regulares relevantes (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> ou <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) de duas formas.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a <xref:System.Uri> and checked against the appropriate list.
trans-unit.target: Em primeiro lugar, o cadeia URI do candidato é verificado face à lista de adequadas; em seguida, se não houver nenhuma correspondência, o candidate cadeia URI é convertido para um <xref:System.Uri>e verificado face à lista de adequado.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> that specifies the access rights that are granted to the URI.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"> </xref> que especifica os direitos de acesso que são concedidos para o URI.

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the URI to which access rights are granted.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que descreve o URI para que o acesso são concedidos direitos.

trans-unit.source: uriString is .
trans-unit.target: uriStringis .

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified URI with the specified access rights to the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o URI especificado com os direitos de acesso especificado para o atual <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you have specified <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> as the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, use <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> to allow the use of `uriRegex` in the target class.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver especificado <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>como o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, utilize <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>para permitir a utilização de `uriRegex` na classe de destino.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> as the `access` parameter to add the URI specified by the `uriRegex` parameter to the list of URI accept strings, or specify <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> as the access parameter to add the URI to the list of URI connect strings.
trans-unit.target: Especifique <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>como o `access` parâmetro para adicionar o URI especificado pelo `uriRegex` parâmetro à lista de URI aceitar as cadeias ou especifique <xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>como o acesso de parâmetro para adicionar o URI à lista de URI ligar cadeias.</xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess> </xref:System.Net.NetworkAccess>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Calling <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> on an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Net.WebPermission> instance will have no effect as permission is granted to all URIs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chamar <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>num <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Net.WebPermission>instância não tem qualquer efeito como permissão é concedida a todos os URIs.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is recommended that you create `uriRegex` using the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> flags.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > É recomendado que crie `uriRegex` utilizando o <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>sinalizadores.</xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> or <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) in two ways.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um candidato a cadeia URI é verificado com a lista de expressões regulares relevantes (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> ou <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A>) de duas formas.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ConnectList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a <xref:System.Uri> and checked against the appropriate list.
trans-unit.target: Em primeiro lugar, o cadeia URI do candidato é verificado face à lista de adequadas; em seguida, se não houver nenhuma correspondência, o candidate cadeia URI é convertido para um <xref:System.Uri>e verificado face à lista de adequado.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A NetworkAccess that specifies the access rights that are granted to the URI.
trans-unit.target: NetworkAccess que especifica os direitos de acesso que são concedidos para o URI.

trans-unit.source: A regular expression that describes the set of URIs to which access rights are granted.
trans-unit.target: Uma expressão regular que descreve o conjunto de URIs para que o acesso são concedidos direitos.

trans-unit.source: The uriRegex parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The uriRegex parameter is .

trans-unit.source: This property returns an enumeration of a single connect permissions held by this <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve uma enumeração de um único ligar permissões contidas por este <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The possible objects types contained in the returned enumeration are <xref:System.String> and <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos possíveis são tipos contidos na enumeração devolvida <xref:System.String>e <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This property gets a list of remote resources that are permitted by this <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade obtém uma lista dos recursos remotos que sejam permitidos pela <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: The class to which you have applied <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> only has permission to connect with resources found in this list.
trans-unit.target: A classe a que aplicou <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>só tem permissão para estabelecer ligação com os recursos localizados nesta lista.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can add URIs to this list using <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Pode adicionar os URIs a esta lista utilizando <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> or ConnectList) in two ways.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um candidato a cadeia URI é verificado com a lista de expressões regulares relevantes (<xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A> ou ConnectList) de duas formas.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AcceptList%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a <xref:System.Uri> and checked against the appropriate list.
trans-unit.target: Em primeiro lugar, o cadeia URI do candidato é verificado face à lista de adequadas; em seguida, se não houver nenhuma correspondência, o candidate cadeia URI é convertido para um <xref:System.Uri>e verificado face à lista de adequado.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface that contains connect permissions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>permissões de ligação de interface que contém.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia de um <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.IPermission> returned by this method represents the same access to resources as the original <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.IPermission>devolvidos por esta representa método o mesmo acesso a recursos que o original <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A> and is implemented to support the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A>e implementados para suportar o <xref:System.Security.IPermission>interface.</xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class that has the same values as the original.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> classe que possui os mesmos valores que o original.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Reconstructs um <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> de uma codificação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The FromXml method reconstructs a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> from an XML encoding that is defined by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> class.
trans-unit.target: O método FromXml reconstructs um <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>de uma codificação XML que é definido pela <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>classe.</xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ToXml%2A> method to XML-encode the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>, including state information.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ToXml%2A>método para codificar o XML de <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>, incluindo informações de estado.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.ToXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding from which to reconstruct the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A codificação XML partir do qual reconstrua o <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The securityElement parameter is
trans-unit.target: O securityElement é o parâmetro

trans-unit.source: securityElement is not a permission element for this type.
trans-unit.target: securityElementNão é um elemento de permissão para este tipo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical intersection of two <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a intersecção de dois lógica <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> instâncias.

trans-unit.source: Intersect returns a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> that contains those permissions that are common in both `target` and the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Intersect devolve um <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>que contenha essas permissões que são comuns em ambos `target` e a instância atual.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A> and is implemented to support the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A>e implementados para suportar o <xref:System.Security.IPermission>interface.</xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> para comparar com a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: A new that represents the intersection of the current instance and the target parameter.
trans-unit.target: Um novo que representa a interseção da instância atual e o target parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If the intersection is empty, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O método devolve a interseção estiver vazia, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: target is not or of type
trans-unit.target: targetNão é ou do tipo

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se atual <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> é um subconjunto do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> specifies a set of associated resources that is wholly contained by the `target` parameter, then the current <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> is a subset of `target`.
trans-unit.target: Se atual <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>Especifica um conjunto de recursos associados que detida está contido pelo `target` parâmetro, em seguida, atual <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>é um subconjunto de `target`.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides IsSubsetOf and is implemented to support the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui IsSubsetOf e implementado para suportar o <xref:System.Security.IPermission>interface.</xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> to compare to the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> para comparar a atual <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if the current instance is a subset of the target parameter; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se a instância atual é um subconjunto do target parâmetro; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: If the target is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for an empty current permission that is not unrestricted and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Se o destino é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, o método devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> uma permissão atual vazia que não é restrita e <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: The target parameter is not an instance of <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de destino não é uma instância de <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current instance contains a Regex-encoded right and there is not exactly the same right found in the target instance.
trans-unit.target: A instância atual contém um direito de Regex codificados e não existe não é exatamente o mesmo direito encontrado na instância de destino.

trans-unit.source: Checks the overall permission state of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verifica o estado de permissão geral a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, then the target class can use all URIs.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>é <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, em seguida, a classe de destino, pode utilizar todos os URIs.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, specific permission must be given for any URI you want to use with the target class.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, a permissão específica deve ser dada para qualquer URI que pretende utilizar com a classe de destino.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A> to add a URI and specify its permissions.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Utilize <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>para adicionar um URI e especifique as respetivas permissões.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission.AddPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> was created with the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref><xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> was created with the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref><xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma codificação XML de um <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> e o respetivo estado atual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.FromXml%2A> method to restore the state information from a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Net.WebPermission.FromXml%2A>método para restaurar as informações de estado de um <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>.</xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission.FromXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> that contains an XML-encoded representation of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>, including state information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> que contém uma representação XML codificado o <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>, incluindo informações de estado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical union between two instances of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a união lógica entre as duas instâncias do <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Union returns a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> that contains all the permissions in both `target` and the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a União um <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>que contém todas as permissões no `target` e a instância atual.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> to combine with the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref> combinar com atual <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the union of the current instance and the target parameter.
trans-unit.target: A que representa a União da instância atual e o target parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If either <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebPermission" name="WebPermission" href=""></xref> is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>, the method returns a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: If either <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebPermission" name="WebPermission" href=""></xref> is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>, the method returns a <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the target is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the method returns a copy of the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se o destino é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, o método devolve uma cópia da atual <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: target is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or of type <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: o destino não é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ou tipo <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>.
